text.div:
OMRSFhir2ImplementationGuide

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.openmrs.org/fhir/ImplementationGuide/openmrs

An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

name: OMRSFhir2ImplementationGuide
title: OpenMRS FHIR2 Implementation Guide
description: An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

resource.name: OMRS Address
resource.description: Address profile specifies the geological location details

resource.name: OpenMRS condition
resource.description: A FHIR Condition as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: Openmrs Encounter
resource.description: A FHIR Encounter as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OMRS Group
resource.description: A Group Resource is described as Cohort in Fhir2 OMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Location
resource.description: An OpenMRS location

resource.name: OpenMRS Location Contact Point
resource.description: An OpenMRS Location Phone Number

resource.name: OpenMRS Medication Request
resource.description: A FHIR MedicationRequest as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient
resource.description: A FHIR Patient as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient Identifier
resource.description: Patient Identifers as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Person
resource.description: A FHIR Person as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: Openmrs Practitioner
resource.description: A FHIR Practitioner as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: A FHIR Allergy as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report
resource.description: DiagnosticReport resource created by a OpenMRS that representing results of diagnostic tests that are performed in a given clinical context.

resource.name: OpenMRS Observation
resource.description: Observation resource created by a OpenMRS that representing a result for an order submitted by an EMR System

resource.name: OpenMRS Service Request
resource.description: Service Request Resource is represents a request for some type of procedure or diagnostic test to be performed. When fulfilled, the results of this request are represented as a DiagnosticReport resource with associated Observation resources

resource.name: OpenMRS Task
resource.description: A Task resource represent an activity that is to be performed,and track the completion of said activity between an OpenMRS and a FHIR2

resource.name: Group descriptive extension
resource.description: Extension for group description

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient Identifier Location
resource.description: OpenMRS location for which this identifier is valid

resource.name: EncounterStatus
resource.description: Encounter  status ValueSet

resource.name: Location Status ValueSet
resource.description: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

resource.name: Medication Request Intent Vs
resource.description: Medication Request Intent ValueSet

resource.name: Medication Request Priority ValueSet
resource.description: Openmrs Medication Request Priority ValueSet

resource.name: OpenMRS Intent for Task
resource.description: The intent of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-intent.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Status for Task
resource.description: The state of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-status.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report Status Flag
resource.description: The status of the diagnostic report, subset from https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-diagnostic-report-status.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Order Code
resource.description: The code for the openmrs requested in the EMR.

resource.name: Encounter Type Code System
resource.description: Encounter Type Coding System

resource.name: Encounter Patient Example
resource.description: OMRS Encounter Resource Example

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance Resource Example
resource.description: Example OMRS Allergy Intolerance

resource.name: Encounter Resource Example
resource.description: Example OMRS Encounter

resource.name: Practitioner Example
resource.description: Practitioner Resource Example

resource.name: Openmrs DiagnosticReport
resource.description: Example OMRS DiagnosticReport Resource

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner family
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner given
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.given={givenName}

resource.name: Location Example
resource.description: Example OMRS location

resource.name: Search in MedicationRequest endpoint basing on MedicationRequest uuid  attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the MedicationRequest uuid field for the MedicationRequest record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/MedicationRequest?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search in MedicationRequest endpoint basing on MedicationRequest lastUpdated  attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the MedicationRequest lastUpdated field for the MedicationRequest record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?_lastUpdated={date-range}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint based on medication reference
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by medication reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?medication={reference}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by a given patient
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by a given patient
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the patient's family name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the patient's given name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the patient's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.name={name}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by a given Practitioner
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given Practitioner Reference uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor={Uuid}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by a given Practitioner
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given Practitioner eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the Practitioner's family name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the Practitioner's given name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by the Practitioner's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.name={name}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by subject uuid
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by subject family
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by subject given
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by subject identifier
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through MedicationRequest endpoint by subject name
resource.description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}

resource.name: OMRS Group Example
resource.description: OMRS Group Resource Example

resource.name: OMRS Medication Request Example
resource.description: Example of the OMRS medication Request Resource

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner's address-city attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-city field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?address-city={city}

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner's address-country attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-country field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?address-country={country}

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner's address-postalcode attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-postalcode field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?address-postalcode={postalCode}

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner's address-state attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-state field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?address-state={state}

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner uuid attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Practitioner uuid field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Practitioner?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search through Practitioner endpoint by a given Practitioner
resource.description: Searches for Practitioner by a given Practitioner eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search in Practitioner endpoint basing on Practitioner lastUpdated  attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Practitioner lastUpdated field for the Practitioner record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?_lastUpdated={date-range}

resource.name: Search through Practitioner endpoint by the Practitioner's family name
resource.description: Searches for Practitioner based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through Practitioner endpoint by the Practitioner's given name
resource.description: Searches for Practitioner based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through Practitioner endpoint by the Practitioner's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for Practitioner based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Practitioner?name={name}

resource.name: Search through FhirTask endpoint by the ServiceRequest Reference uuid
resource.description: Searches for FhirTask based on the ServiceRequest Reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?based-on={ServiceRequestUuid}

resource.name: Search in Task endpoint basing on Task uuid attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Task uuid field for the Task record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Task?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search in Task endpoint basing on Task lastUpdated attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Task lastUpdated field for the Task record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?_lastUpdated={date}

resource.name: Search through FhirTask endpoint by the Organization Reference uuid
resource.description: Searches for FhirTask based on the Organization Reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?owner={uuid}

resource.name: Search through FhirTask endpoint by FhirTask status in the current state
resource.description: Searches for FhirTask based on the FhirTask status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?status={codeable concept}

resource.name: Condition Resource Example
resource.description: Example OMRS Condition

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by concept code
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the condition concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?code={code}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by encounter uuid
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the condition encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?encounter={uuid}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by service Uuid
resource.description: Searches for condition based on service Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by service lastUpdated field
resource.description: Searches for condition based on service lastUpdated field eg) /openmrs/ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_lastUpdated={date}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Occurrence when service should occurance
resource.description: Searches for condition based on to occurrent date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?occurrence={date}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by patient uuid
resource.description: Searches for condition by a given patient Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient={uuid}

resource.name: Search condition endpoint by patient identifier id
resource.description: Searches for Condition by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by the patient's family name
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through condtion endpoint by the patient's given name
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by the patient's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the  patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.name={name}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner uuid
resource.description: Searches for condition by Practitioner uuid who requested the service eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner={uuid}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner identifier
resource.description: Searches for condition by the Practitioner identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner name
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.name={name}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by subject uuid
resource.description: Searches for condition by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/condition?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through condtion endpoint by subject family
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by subject given
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by subject identifier
resource.description: Searches for condition by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by subject name
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.name={name}
